title: Unemployment rate in Northern Ireland ( UK ) 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Unemployment rate has rose over the Year.

Unemployment rate is roughly decreasing from 2003 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2006, gradually increasing from 2006 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2013, and finally slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Unemployment rate, about 7.5 was reported at Year 2013
Minimum Unemployment rate about 3.9 was reached at Year 2007
min_summary: Overall Unemployment rate has increased over the Year.

Unemployment rate is roughly decreasing from 2003 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2006, gradually increasing from 2006 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2013, and finally slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014.
